class_notes: Permission required for course. Please write directly to the course instructor and, if approved, forward to the CS Graduate Coordinator for a permission code.
course_description: This course covers fundamental machine learning theory and techniques. The topics include basic theory, classification methods, model generalization, clustering, and dimension reduction. The material will be conveyed by a series of lectures, homeworks, and projects.
sections: Class Nbr: 3866, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: H. Kwon, Status: Open
